Empty.Name: Empty
Empty.Description: You sure wished you had something to put here.

Minor Healing.Name: Minor Healing
Minor Healing.Description: The easiest Health potion to make. Often made by apprentices as practice and sold for little.

Minor Mana.Name: Minor Mana
Minor Mana.Description: The simplest potion to make. So simple in fact, that it often occurs naturally in mana dense springs. Great practice for amature Alchemists.

Minor Damage\u002B.Name: Minor Damage+
Minor Damage\u002B.Description: This potion is helps you strike just that little bit harder and faster. Barely noticable though greatly helpful.

Minor Defense\u002B.Name: Minor Defense+
Minor Defense\u002B.Description: The effect of this potion is often overlooked in favour of Minor Damage+, though just as helpful. Regular use may have lasting aftereffects.
